entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unmodified Custom T4 template scaffolding fails with missing definition for "GetRequiredUsings" method #32848
  • EF Core 8 - please add HasOne to ComplexPropertyBuilder<T> #32847
  • EF Core 8 - InvalidOperationException when updating ComplexProperty using ExecuteUpdateAsync #32846

Closed

  • Optimized model no longer using correct schemas in EF 8.0.0 #32739
    9.0.0
  • Query: primitive collection parameters values should reflect the type they are representing #32515
  • Getting errors when mixing DbFunction and SqlQueryRaw #32680
    8.0.2

PullRequests

Merged

  • Make AdHocMapper and RelationalAdHocMapper public #32839
  • Add back some methods to the compiled model that are used for customization #32805
  • [TINY/TESTONLY] Resolution to #32515 - Query: primitive collection parameters values should reflect the type they are representing #32845
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32844
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32843
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update SqlClient dependency #32842
  • [release/8.0] Bump SqlClient version #32838
    tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Update SqlClient dependency #32841
    tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Update SqlClient dependency #32840
    tell-mode
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3mc from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32834
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32833
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] Don't discover DbFunctions when building ad-hoc model #32807
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2

Updated

  • Use table mappings for FromSql #32816
  • Redo query column/table relationship without TableReferenceExpression #32812
  • Stop stripping new lines from migration script literals #32788
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Core issue with multiple Blob colums #32770
    waiting-for-response
